com.esri.mo2.util
Interface PropertiesFileLocator

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasePropertiesResourceFileLocator
public interface PropertiesFileLocator
extends Cloneable

Provides a means for locating one or more Properties files from a collection of Properties files. Typically this will be all the Properties files located in a file system folder, or perhaps resources folder.

Method Summary
 Object clone()
          ensure clone() is public
 Properties findfile(String name)
          Locates and reads a Properties file with given file name.
 String[] getFilenames()
          Returns the names of all properties file known to this Locator.
 String getLabel(String name)
          Returns a label suitable for user interface usage for the given file name.

Throws:
